description: ArcGIS-backed station autocomplete API used by Amtrak; returns station suggestions for a given searchTerm.
explanation: This request is issued while typing into the station field and queries the AutoCompleterArcgis service with a searchTerm parameter (example shows searchTerm=bos). The captured transaction confirms the exact endpoint and method for the station autocomplete flow. For context, the site also pulls a full station catalog used to power suggestions from https://www.amtrak.com/services/data.stations.json, which complements the live autocomplete behavior.
